title: Lag only when playing League for about a week now
body:
Does anyone know what could be the problem? I'm on EUW and I only seem to lag when I play League (the champ I'm playing doing everything 1 second after I click). My ping is fine (13) and my FPS too. 
I don't know when it exactly started happening but I think it's been since sometime around last week.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing some packet loss on the way to our servers. There could be a few different reasons for this, but the most common causes are network settings that conflict with League. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are properly configured.

Let me know if this caused any change.
if youre getting studder lags I am also having the same problem. And yes it did start sometime last week.
